text: Zoran Stojković (; 7 October 1946 — 6 July 2020) was a Serbian politician. He was Minister of Justice in the Government of Serbia from 2004 to 2007 when Vojislav Koštunica was Prime Minister.Questions Arise on New Serbia Government He was born in Belgrade. He was a member of the Democratic Party of Serbia. Stojković died on 6 July 2020 in Belgrade, aged 73. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Belgrade
title: Zoran Stojković
